subject: [R] questions on package of KEGG
body:
Dear list members:
   Once I know a KEGG pathway identifier, how can I check all its direct children identifiers? you know, I could use GOMFCHILDREN or GOCCCHILDREN to check the children terms for a specific GO term, but I don't know how to do it in the same way for KEGG in R?
   Many Thanks!!
Hua

______________________________________________
R-help@stat.math.ethz.ch mailing list
https://stat.ethz.ch/mailman/listinfo/r-help
PLEASE do read the posting guide http://www.R-project.org/posting-guide.html
and provide commented, minimal, self-contained, reproducible code.
